item.name: INIT
1. Register a new DMP service
2. Register a new data repository
3. Get all RDM services
4. Set the property rights to the DMP service
5. Set the property rights to the data repository
6. Get all RDM services
FTC1
1. Send a minimal maDMP with the incomplete body.
2. Send a new minimal maDMP with wrong timing.
3. Send a new minimal maDMP.
4. Send a new minimal maDMP again with the same identifier.
5. Send the minimal maDMP with the invalid modified property.
6. Send a long maDMP with the same identifier.
FTC2
1. Send a new minimal maDMP.
2. Get the maDMP with incomplete parameters.
3. Get the maDMP with wrong parameters.
4. Get the maDMP with wrong identifiers.
5. Get the current version of the maDMP.
FTC3
1. Send a new maDMP with the dataset.
2. Update the identifier with incomplete parameters.
3. Update the identifier with the incomplete body.
4. Update the identifier with the wrong specialization.
5. Update the identifier of the dataset.
6. Get the current version of the maDMP and verify the modification.
FTC4
1. Send a new maDMP with the dataset.
2. Delete the object with incomplete parameters.
3. Delete the object without the body.
4. Delete the object with the wrong identifier.
5. Delete the object with the wrong identifier.
6. Delete the object.
7. Get the current version of the maDMP and verify the deletions.
FTC5
1. Send a new maDMP with dataset.
2. Update the identifier of the dataset.
3. Get identifier history with wrong parameters.
4. Get identifier history of the dataset.
FTC6
1. Send a new minimal maDMP.
2. Send a new maDMP out of the modification scope.
3. Get the current version of the maDMP and verify the modification scope.

exec: pm.expect(responseJson.dmp.description).not.to.be.oneOf(["This DMP is for our new project."]);

item.name: FTC7
1. Send a new minimal maDMP.
2. Update the maDMP with a long body.
3. Delete the dataset.
4. Update the maDMP with the deleted dataset.
5. Update the maDMP with the old modified property.
FTC8
1. Send a new long maDMP with 3 datasets.
2. Delete the dataset 0.
3. Delete the dataset 1.
4. Update the identifier of the dataset 2 to 0.
5. Delete the dataset 0.
6. Delete project information.
7. Get the current version of the maDMP.
